survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on urban commuter bicycle usage patterns, preferences, and challenges to improve cycling infrastructure and services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a bicycle for commuting in urban areas?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How often do you use a bicycle for commuting in urban areas?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using a bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using a bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when cycling in urban areas?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when cycling in urban areas?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current bicycle infrastructure (e.g., bike lanes, parking) in your city?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Single-choice radio button recommended.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current bicycle infrastructure (e.g., bike lanes, parking) in your city?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in using a bike-sharing program if available in your city?
